text: This paper delves into the moral aspect of human behavior known as empathy, particularly in the context of the global workplace and the considerations involving employee stakeholders. Human resources and managerial oversight are crucial in managing the complexities of human emotions and interactions within business organizations. Business ethics and risk management practices are integral to workplace dynamics. The emergence of AI-reliant business practices highlights the need to consider the ethical implications of AI on employees. This study explores the ethical lens of AI's impact on business-employee relations, emphasizing the role of empathy in understanding human intentions within the workplace.
